title: Pset_AirTerminalPHistory
description: Air terminal performance history common attributes.

SupplyAirTemperatureHeating.title: SupplyAirTemperatureHeating
SupplyAirTemperatureHeating.description: Supply air temperature in heating mode.

SupplyAirTemperatureCooling.title: SupplyAirTemperatureCooling
SupplyAirTemperatureCooling.description: Supply air temperature in cooling mode.

PressureDrop.title: PressureDrop
PressureDrop.description: Drop in total pressure between inlet and outlet at nominal air-flow rate.

InductionRatio.title: InductionRatio
InductionRatio.description: Induction ratio versus distance from the diffuser and its discharge direction; induction ratio (or entrainment ratio) is the ratio of the volumetric flow rate in the jet to the volumetric flow rate at the air terminal.

CenterlineAirVelocity.title: CenterlineAirVelocity
CenterlineAirVelocity.description: Centerline air velocity versus distance from the diffuser and temperature differential; a function of distance from diffuser and temperature difference between supply air and room air.
